data.name: Sizeable
data.detailed_description:
What is Sizeable?

Sizeable is a short, relaxing and casual puzzle/exploration game all about shrinking and growing. The game started out as a student project and made it's way to becoming business goose studio's first real game! It's a passion project made with a lot of love that you hopefully will enjoy as much as we did making it!

Shrinking and growing is the key!

What if you where given the power to shrink the moon? Or maybe the sun? Or maybe every house, tree, planet,...?
In Sizeable you receive the power to do exactly that! Use your resizing powers to manipulate the objects around you. Shrink the moon and lower the tide or resize a cloud to make it super windy! Puzzle your way through every level in order to find the 3 hidden objects. Maybe you'll even find a secret turtle aswel?

Features

  • A relaxing puzzle/exploration experience
  • 34 beautiful low poly dioramas ranging from deserts to space!
  • 34 Secret tortoises to find!
  • Relaxing music written and composed by Jamal Green!
  • A Diorama Building Mode!
  • 10 Secret diorama's to find, unlock & play!
  • More free level additions to come in the future!

The future of Sizeable?

Sizeable will be updated with several free updates in the future! All these updates will have their own unique theme chosen by the community!



Make sure to join our discord so you can participate in the community polls: https://discord.com/invite/hyEhfENBQN

data.short_description: Sizeable is a relaxing and peacefull puzzle/exploration game! Shrink and grow your way through small dioramas in search of hidden objects!
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Dutch, Portuguese, Polish, French, Swedish, Italian
data.reviews:
“Sizeable is a small game that leaves a big impact.”
9/10 – ThisGenGaming

“Sizeable demo boasts some lovely, tactile puzzling”
PC Gamer

“Sizeable may not be a very long experience, but it is an absolutely delightful one worth having.”
4/5 – Hey poor Player

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
